item.title: Exploration of the Modern Day NFL
item.description: library(tidyverse) dat_nfl <- read_csv("nfl_elo_latest.csv") Data The NFL Elo dataset contains 256 observations of 30 variables. The data was collected by downloading nfl_elo_latest.csv from the FiveThirtyEight Github page. Altogether, the data comprised in this file details the game-by-game Elo ratings and forecasts for the latest NFL regular season up until Jan 3, 2021. There are many factors that go into these predictive metrics, however the more important ones refer to the QB play on a given team.

item.title: A Shortened MLB Season? The Good and the Bad.
